com.codename1.webrtc

Class MediaStreamConstraints

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.webrtc.MediaStreamConstraints
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONStruct

    public class MediaStreamConstraints
extends Object
implements JSONStruct

    The MediaStreamConstraints dictionary is used when calling RTC.getUserMedia(com.codename1.webrtc.MediaStreamConstraints) to specify what kinds of tracks should be included in the returned MediaStream, and, optionally, to establish constraints for those tracks' settings.

        public MediaStreamConstraints()

    • Method Detail

      • getAudioConstraints

        public AudioTrackConstraints getAudioConstraints()

        a MediaTrackConstraints object providing the constraints which must be met by the audio track included in the returned MediaStream. If constraints are specified, an audio track is inherently requested.

        Returns:
        the audioConstraints
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStreamConstraints/audio

      • setAudioConstraints

        public void setAudioConstraints(AudioTrackConstraints audioConstraints)

        a MediaTrackConstraints object providing the constraints which must be met by the audio track included in the returned MediaStream. If constraints are specified, an audio track is inherently requested.

        Parameters:
        audioConstraints - the audioConstraints to set
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStreamConstraints/audio

      • getVideoConstraints

        public VideoTrackConstraints getVideoConstraints()

        a MediaTrackConstraints object providing the constraints which must be met by the video track included in the returned MediaStream. If constraints are specified, a video track is inherently requested.

        Returns:
        the videoConstraints
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStreamConstraints/video

      • audio

        public AudioTrackConstraints audio()

        Gets audio constraints associated with this stream constraints object. If it doesn’t have any constraints yet, it will create a new AudioTrackConstraints object and associate that with the stream constraints.

        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStreamConstraints/audio
